errorMessages.loadVacationData: Could not load your vacation data. Please try again later.
errorMessages.userIdNotFound: User ID not found. Please log in again.
errorMessages.verifyAccount: Could not verify your account. Please try logging in again.

auth.accountCreated: Your account has been created successfully!
auth.signInDescription: Enter your credentials to access your account
auth.signupDescription: Enter your details to create a new account
auth.resetPasswordEmailSentDescription: Check your email for a password reset link
auth.resetPasswordEmailSentLong: We've sent a password reset link to your email. Please check your inbox and follow the instructions to reset your password.
auth.forgotPasswordDescription: Enter your email to receive a password reset link

dashboard.quickActionsDescription: Common tasks you might want to do

vacationForm.title: Request Vacation
vacationForm.description: Fill out the form below to request time off.
vacationForm.vacationTypeDescription: Select the type of time off you're requesting.
vacationForm.notesPlaceholder: Add any additional information about your vacation request
vacationForm.requestingDays: You're requesting {days} working day(s) of vacation.

vacationDetails.title: Vacation Details
vacationDetails.deleteWarning: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your vacation request.

calendar.title: Vacation Calendar
calendar.calendarDescription: View and manage your vacation days
calendar.noVacationsForDate: No vacations scheduled for this date.
calendar.selectDateWithIndicator: Select a date with a colored indicator to view details.

insights.title: Vacation Insights
insights.vacationByTypeDescription: Distribution of your vacation days by type
insights.smartInsightsDescription: Personalized insights based on your vacation patterns
insights.monthlyDistributionDescription: Your vacation days usage by month
insights.vacationTrendsDescription: Analysis of your vacation patterns over time
insights.trendAnalysisMessage: More detailed trend analysis will be available after you've used the app for a longer period.

settings.title: Settings
settings.totalVacationDaysDescription: This is your annual vacation allowance.
settings.resetDateDescription: Your vacation days will reset on this date each year.
settings.vacationApprovedDescription: Receive an email when your vacation request is approved
settings.vacationRejectedDescription: Receive an email when your vacation request is rejected
settings.vacationRemindersDescription: Receive a reminder email before your vacation starts
settings.balanceNotificationsDescription: Receive notifications when your vacation balance is running low
settings.statusUpdatesDescription: Receive notifications for vacation request status changes
settings.upcomingVacationsDescription: Receive reminders about your upcoming vacations
settings.darkModeDescription: Toggle between light and dark mode
settings.includeWeekendDaysDescription: Count weekend days in vacation calculations
settings.calendarIntegrationsDescription: Connect your calendar to sync vacation days
settings.googleCalendarDescription: Sync your vacations with Google Calendar
settings.outlookCalendarDescription: Sync your vacations with Outlook Calendar
settings.appleCalendarDescription: Sync your vacations with Apple Calendar

welcome.trackVacationsDesc: Keep track of your vacation days, see your remaining balance, and plan ahead.
welcome.requestTimeOffDesc: Submit vacation requests easily and get notified when they're approved.
welcome.calendarViewDesc: View your vacations in a calendar format to better plan your time off.

welcome.title: Welcome to Jazati
welcome.description: The optimal vacation management app to organize and track your vacations with ease

addVacation.title: Add New Vacation
addVacation.description: You can easily add a new vacation by selecting the type, date, and adding notes

insights.title: Statistics and Insights
insights.description: Get detailed insights and statistics about your vacation usage and distribution throughout the year

getStarted.title: Let's Get Started
getStarted.description: You are now ready to use the Jazati app. Click the button below to start managing your vacations
